TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit CompilerInfo extends System.Object

summary.span: Represents the configuration settings of a language provider.

span.span: Represents the configuration settings of a language provider.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用類別，以判斷是否實作設定的電腦上，或是檢查特定語言提供者的組態和編譯器設定。Use the class to determine whether a implementation is configured on the computer, or to examine the configuration and compiler settings for a specific language provider. [ <System.codedom>項目](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/compiler/system-codedom-element.md)機器組態檔案包含的語言提供者和編譯器組態設定。The [<system.codedom> Element](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/compiler/system-codedom-element.md) in the machine configuration file contains the language provider and compiler configuration settings. 每個已設定的語言提供者會有對應的編譯器組態項目。Each configured language provider has a corresponding compiler configuration element. 每個項目會定義實作類型、 支援的語言名稱，支援的檔案名稱副檔名，以及編譯器參數。Each element defines the implementation type, supported language names, supported file name extensions, and compiler parameters. .NET Framework 會在電腦組態檔中定義初始編譯器設定。The .NET Framework defines the initial compiler settings in the machine configuration file. 開發人員和編譯器廠商可以為新的 實作新增組態設定。Developers and compiler vendors can add configuration settings for a new implementation. 類別會提供唯讀存取權的機器組態檔中的這些設定。The class provides read-only access to these settings in the machine configuration file. 使用， ，和語言提供者檢查對應的組態屬性的成員。Use the , , and members to examine the corresponding configuration attributes for a language provider. 使用方法，以取得語言提供者的編譯器選項和警告層級的屬性值。Use the method to obtain the compiler options and warning level attribute values for a language provider. 如需組態檔中的語言提供者設定的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 編譯器和語言提供者設定結構描述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c020b139-8699-4f0d-9ac9-70d0c5b2a8c8)。For more details on language provider settings in the configuration file, see [Compiler and Language Provider Settings Schema](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c020b139-8699-4f0d-9ac9-70d0c5b2a8c8). > [!NOTE] > 這個類別包含在類別層級套用至所有成員的連結要求。This class contains a link demand at the class level that applies to all members. A立即呼叫端沒有完全信任權限時，會擲回。A is thrown when the immediate caller does not have full-trust permission. 如需連結要求的詳細資訊，請參閱[連結要求](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md)。For details about link demands, see [Link Demands](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示的語言提供者組態設定。The following code example displays language provider configuration settings. 命令列引數用來指定語言、 副檔名或提供者類型。Command-line arguments are used to specify a language, file name extension, or provider type. 針對給定的輸入，此範例會判斷對應的語言提供者，並會顯示已設定的語言編譯器設定。For the given input, the example determines the corresponding language provider and displays the configured language compiler settings. [!code-cpp[CodeDom_CompilerInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CodeDom_CompilerInfo/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[CodeDom_CompilerInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CodeDom_CompilerInfo/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[CodeDom_CompilerInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/CodeDom_CompilerInfo/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CodeDomProviderType As Type
public: property Type ^ CodeDomProviderType { Type ^ get(); };

summary.span: Gets the type of the configured implementation.

span.span: Gets the type of the configured implementation.

value.span: 唯讀執行個體，表示已設定的語言提供者類型。

span.span: A read-only instance that represents the configured language provider type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 電腦組態檔包含每個的完整型別名稱在電腦上的實作。The machine configuration file contains the fully qualified type name for each implementation on the computer. 屬性值是執行個體，表示已設定的語言提供者實作。The property value is a instance that represents a configured language provider implementation. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例可讓您判斷是否已設定的輸入的語言在電腦上的實作。The following code example determines whether the input language has a configured implementation on the computer. 如果沒有針對指定的語言設定的提供者，此範例會顯示語言提供者組態設定。If there is a provider configured for the specified language, the example displays the language provider configuration settings. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[CodeDom_CompilerInfo#7](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CodeDom_CompilerInfo/CPP/source.cpp#7)] [!code-csharp[CodeDom_CompilerInfo#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CodeDom_CompilerInfo/CS/source.cs#7)] [!code-vb[CodeDom_CompilerInfo#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/CodeDom_CompilerInfo/VB/source.vb#7)]

exception.span: The language provider is not configured on this computer.

span.span: The language provider is not configured on this computer.

span.span: Cannot locate the type because it is a or empty string.

exception.span: -or- Cannot locate the type because the name for the cannot be found in the configuration file.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerParameters CreateDefaultCompilerParameters() cil managed

summary.span: Gets the configured compiler settings for the language provider implementation.

span.span: Gets the configured compiler settings for the language provider implementation.

returns.span: A read-only instance that contains the compiler options and settings configured for the language provider.

span.span: A read-only instance that contains the compiler options and settings configured for the language provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法來檢查的編譯器設定所傳回的執行個體和方法。Use the method to examine the compiler settings of the instances returned by the and methods. [ <System.codedom>項目](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/compiler/system-codedom-element.md)中的機器組態檔案會包含每個語言提供者和編譯器組態設定在電腦上的實作。The [<system.codedom> Element](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/compiler/system-codedom-element.md) in the machine configuration file contains the language provider and compiler configuration settings for each implementation on the computer. 每個語言提供者組態項目可以包含選擇性`compilerOptions`和`warningLevel`屬性。Each language provider configuration element can contain optional `compilerOptions` and `warningLevel` attributes. 這些屬性定義的預設值和屬性。These attributes define the default values for the and properties. 如果未定義的語言提供者組態項目`compilerOptions`屬性，屬性值為空字串 ("")。If the language provider configuration element does not define the `compilerOptions` attribute, the property value is an empty string (""). 如果未定義的語言提供者組態項目`warningLevel`屬性，屬性值為-1。If the language provider configuration element does not define the `warningLevel` attribute, the property value is –1. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例可讓您判斷是否已設定的輸入的語言在電腦上的實作。The following code example determines whether the input language has a configured implementation on the computer. 如果沒有針對指定的語言設定的提供者，此範例會顯示語言提供者組態設定。If there is a provider configured for the specified language, the example displays the language provider configuration settings. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[CodeDom_CompilerInfo#7](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CodeDom_CompilerInfo/CPP/source.cpp#7)] [!code-csharp[CodeDom_CompilerInfo#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CodeDom_CompilerInfo/CS/source.cs#7)] [!code-vb[CodeDom_CompilerInfo#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/CodeDom_CompilerInfo/VB/source.vb#7)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會傳回目前語言提供者設定的執行個體。The method returns a instance for the current language provider settings. 使用方法來取得實作所傳回的執行個體或方法。Use the method to get a implementation for a instance returned by the or method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例列舉電腦上的語言提供者，並顯示每個語言提供者的組態和編譯器設定。The following code example enumerates the language providers on the computer and displays the configuration and compiler settings for each language provider. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會傳回目前語言提供者設定與指定的提供者選項的執行個體。The method returns a instance for the current language provider settings and the specified provider options. 如需支援的提供者選項的資訊，請參閱特定的 CodeDOM 提供者文件。For information about supported provider options, see the specific CodeDOM provider documentation. 使用方法來取得實作所傳回的執行個體或方法。Use the method to get a implementation for a instance returned by the or method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [ <System.codedom>項目](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/compiler/system-codedom-element.md)中的機器組態檔案會包含每個語言提供者和編譯器組態設定在電腦上的實作。The [<system.codedom> Element](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/compiler/system-codedom-element.md) in the machine configuration file contains the language provider and compiler configuration settings for each implementation on the computer. 每個已設定的語言提供者支援一或多個副檔名的檔案。Each configured language provider supports one or more file name extensions. 比方說，可能支援的檔案名稱副檔名".cs"和".c #"。For example, a might support the file name extensions ".cs" and ".c#". ## Examples 下列程式碼範例列舉電腦上的語言提供者，並顯示每個語言提供者的組態和編譯器設定。The following code example enumerates the language providers on the computer and displays the configuration and compiler settings for each language provider. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. summary.span: Returns the hash code for the current instance.

span.span: Returns the hash code for the current instance.

returns.span: A 32-bit signed integer hash code for the current instance, suitable for use in hashing algorithms and data structures such as a hash table.

span.span: A 32-bit signed integer hash code for the current instance, suitable for use in hashing algorithms and data structures such as a hash table.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會覆寫方法。This method overrides the method. 這個方法會為兩個物件產生相同雜湊程式碼，這兩個物件根據 方法是相等的物件。This method generates the same hash code for two objects that are equal according to the method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例建立的執行個體類別。The following code example creates an instance of the class. 此範例會顯示提供者名稱、 雜湊程式碼和新的提供者執行個體的預設檔案名稱副檔名。The example displays the provider name, hash code, and default file name extension for the new provider instance. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks [ <System.codedom>項目](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/compiler/system-codedom-element.md)中的機器組態檔案會包含每個語言提供者和編譯器組態設定在電腦上的實作。The [<system.codedom> Element](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/compiler/system-codedom-element.md) in the machine configuration file contains the language provider and compiler configuration settings for each implementation on the computer. 每個已設定的語言提供者支援一或多個語言的名稱。Each configured language provider supports one or more language names. 例如，物件可能會傳回與語言名稱"c#"、"cs"，"csharp"陣列。For example, the object for a might return an array with the language names "c#", "cs", and "csharp". ## Examples 下列程式碼範例列舉電腦上的語言提供者，並顯示每個語言提供者的組態和編譯器設定。The following code example enumerates the language providers on the computer and displays the configuration and compiler settings for each language provider. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來檢查才能存取的提供者的屬性或方法的實作。Use the property to check the implementation before accessing the provider properties or methods. 比方說，之後您取得語言提供者設定，從方法，請使用屬性，確認提供者型別實作，然後再呼叫方法，或使用屬性。For example, after you get the language provider settings from the method, use the property to verify the provider type implementation before calling the method or using the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例可讓您判斷是否已設定的輸入的語言在電腦上的實作。The following code example determines whether the input language has a configured implementation on the computer. 如果沒有針對指定的語言設定的提供者，此範例會顯示語言提供者組態設定。If there is a provider configured for the specified language, the example displays the language provider configuration settings. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class.
